name: 洪子逸
objective: This course covers the main topics of SA/SD (System Analasis/System Design): Foundations for systems development, planning, analysis, design, implementation and maintenance.
schedule:
1.Course description
2.Introduction
3.Foundations for systems development
4.Determing system requirements
5.Progress report (I)
6.Structuring system process requirements
7.Progress report (II)
8.Structuring system logic requirements
9.Progress report (III)
10.Structuring system data requirements
11.Progress report (IV)
12.Designing databases
13.Progress report (V)
14.Designing forms and reports
15.Progress report (VI)
16.Designing interfaces and dialogues
17.Finalizing design specifications
18.Final Project
scorePolicy:
Performance in class: 30%
Progress report: 30%
Final project: 40%
materials: Hoffer, J. A., George, J. F., & Valacich, J. S. (2008). <i>Modern systems analysis and design</i>, 5th Ed., Pearson Prentice Hall.
